name: Choices (altcock)
description:
This is a game of truths, lies and things that are both and neither. This scenario is 100% true. These are a variety of things that could have happened to me.

This is my first Twine creation! I don't know how obvious it is that I have no idea what I'm doing. One day I will know what a Javascript is.

(Cover art description: white cursive text with a green shadow against a black background, reading "Bitch, you try making cover art!".

Screenshot 1 description: a black background with red text reading "Trigger warning: this game contains non-graphic depictions of grief, self-harm, substance abuse and suicide, and a fairly detailed depiction of addiction. If these things are triggering to you, do not play this game. If you have doubts then please put your own wellbeing first." White text then reads "Hello. Welcome to a game of half-truths about my experiences of living with grief." There are three clickable options in blue: "Begin.", "Disclaimers." and "About the creator."

Screenshot 2 description: three clickable options in blue; "Get clean.", "Keep smoking and drinking.", and "Give up.")
